name: Photonic Distress
description: Photonic Distress (or PD for short) is a blend of First/Third Person puzzler/platformer with a unique twist. Navigate your way through randomly generated dark levels, lighting your way up and collecting Memory Fragments to wake up!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 or better,  AMD 7970 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 11 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 4+ GHz Quad core Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or better, AMD RX 580 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 11 GB available space
